title: Black Pepper Beef and Cabbage Stir-Fry Recipe
text: Coarsely crushed black peppercorns star in this quick weeknight dish, which is built primarily from pantry staples. Donâ€™t be shy about adding the entire tablespoon of pepper, as it balances out the richness of the beef and adds a lightly spicy bite to the dish. A quick rub of garlic, brown sugar, salt, pepper and cornstarch seasons the beef; the cornstarch helps tenderize the beef and later imparts a silky texture to the sauce. Feel free to marinate the beef up to 8 hours ahead and cook when you're ready. If leftovers remain, tuck them into a crunchy baguette or roll them into a wrap.
